Flow.description: Adding functionality to revert a check-in
Flow.label: SF - Check-In Lecture Attendees

fields.name: headerCheckInScreen
fields.fieldText: Check in Attendees

fields.name: displaySuccessCheckIn
fields.fieldText: Successfully checked in {!CheckInCount} attendee(s)!

fields.name: displayWalkInCreatedSuccess
fields.fieldText: Walk-In Created and Checked In

fields.name: displayCheckInRevertedNotice
fields.fieldText: Check-In Reverted

fields.name: displayUnCheckInNotice
fields.fieldText:
Undo Check-in

If you select a row in the below table, you can undo the check-in. You will be asked to confirm.


Clicking Check-In will instead revert the check-in of the attendee you select

fields.name: displayRevertCheckinFinalAlert
fields.fieldText:
Clicking Check-In will revert the check-in of

{!dtCheckedIn.firstSelectedRow.FirstName} {!dtCheckedIn.firstSelectedRow.LastName}

fields.name: headerScreen3UndoCheckin
fields.fieldText:
Revert Check-In


You are about to revert the check-in of

{!dtCheckedIn.firstSelectedRow.FirstName} {!dtCheckedIn.firstSelectedRow.LastName}


Please confirm
